title: 589 rp :( need 1 rp for rune page bundle

replies.body: Message support and they should send you that one RP.
yeah i messaged support yesterday i just hope they can send me the 1 rp before the sale ends
When my friend needed a couple RP for a skin, they granted him it but only if he drew a new skin concept. I must admit it didn't look too bad in the end
Message player support with a drawn pic of ur fav champ. Problem solved.
Riot Ames I summon thee come forth and grant this man his wish (jk it doesn't work that way)
